17
18#include <config.h>
19
20/* Specification. */
21#include "xalloc.h"
22
23#include <string.h>
24
25/* Return a newly allocated copy of STRING. */
26
27char *
28xstrdup (const char *string)
29{
30 return strcpy (xmalloc (strlen (string) + 1), string);
31}
32
